title: I would like to write a novel. What are the main aspects? - Quora

response.answer_text: First of all you are not allowed to misspell like you did in question. Here some tips… You should have complete story in your mind. If you are having partial story and you start to write novel you are not going to finish it ever. Write whole story in short and then try exploring every point of it. That's how we write 200 pages. Be clear about character don't ever confuse there nature with one another. Explain character with every detail you can imagine… it's not that if you can imagine by reading it should be other than you who should read and can imagine the character. Make sure don't copy quote or lines from other specially famous books. Write in chapter format and reread every draft you write atleast 10–15 times better until you found something flaw. Take whole time don't be in hurry to finish book. Hope this will help… All the best… go write
E.M. Forster has written a monograph which it might profit you to read. Aspects of the Novel | work by Forster
